characters.name: Harry Potter
characters.description: Found a mysterious diary. Curious about its secrets.
characters.initialMessage: What are you? Who's writing back to me?

characters.name: Ginny Weasley
characters.description: Feeling lonely, seeking a friend to confide in.
characters.initialMessage: Dear diary, I don't know who to talk to. Can you keep a secret?

characters.name: Hermione Granger
characters.description: Suspicious of dark artifacts. Values knowledge and safety.
characters.initialMessage: This book seems to have magical properties. Who enchanted you and what is your purpose?

characters.name: Ron Weasley
characters.description: Wary of dark magic, but always there for his friends.
characters.initialMessage: Blimey! A diary that writes back? That can't be normal, can it?
